'''Margid Rustborin''' was a [[Dwarves|Dwarf]] of [[Khazad-dûm]] during the late [[Second Age]]. Margid Rustborin was invented for the ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' by [[Amazon Studios]], where she was mentioned in one episode.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://twitter.com/PrimeVideo/status/1562862442148798466|articlename=Meet Prince Durin IV and Princess Disa in #TheRingsOfPower.|dated=|website=Twitter|accessed=25 August 2022}}</ref>

== History ==
[[Durin IV]] reminisces how he might have married Margid Rustborin, but eventually ended up marrying [[Disa]].
